## Validators class

Validations functions for datetime

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class Validators 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [datetime(datetime)](./datetime.validators.datetime.md) | <code>static</code> | Creates validator function that validates control if its value is valid datetime value |
|  [maxDatetime(datetime, dateApi)](./datetime.validators.maxdatetime.md) | <code>static</code> | Creates validator function that validates control if its value is withing range of maximal datetime value |
|  [minDatetime(datetime, dateApi)](./datetime.validators.mindatetime.md) | <code>static</code> | Creates validator function that validates control if its value is withing range of minimal datetime value |
